page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA
page.content: Afternoon school starts at 1.00 p.m. In the afternoon we usually have lessons like Social Studies, or Art and Games. The bell goes at 2.25 for last break. I usually still have a few sweets left so I eat these then play for a few minutes. School finishes at 3.35 and I go home for my tea. I have some chip cobs and a cup of tea. At 5 o'clock I go to the St. John's Ambulance Brigade Cadets where we learn about First Aid. Every year there is a big parade and competition held at the Miners' Holiday Centre in Skegness. I get back from the meeting at 6 o'clock. I can play out again until 8 o'clock when I come in for a bath and then watch television until 10 o'clock. I have three biscuits and a cup of tea for my supper. Then I go to bed.
